author: ianna
body:
* Try to avoid constant modification of the script with evolving 2023 geometry scenarios by adding a version (Dxxx) defined in dict2023Geometry.py

For example:
```
cmsRun Fireworks/Geometry/python/dumpSimGeometry_cfg.py tag=2023 version=D10
```

@kpedro88 - BTW, dict2023Geometry.py is out-of-date with available scenarios
title: Add 2023 Geometry Scenario Version
